njoy the Movie!!!

Notes: To preserve the original IMAX theatrical viewing experience,the picture image will alternate
between 2.35:1 and 1.78:1 aspect ratios.The black bars on your screen will adjust accordingly.

Be careful...I notice a few other releases did not preserve the alternating aspect ratios...they have cropped theirs to 1280 x 544 through the entire movie...
